陶器: (touki) - porcelain (porcelana de pasta mole especialmente), china, chinaware, earthenware, pottery, ceramics, crockery

陶酔境: (とうすいきょう) - become intoxicated (by liquor or music) or enraptured
陸々: (ろくろく) - hardly; barely; inadequately (with negative grammatical constructions)

陸な: (ろくな) - (usually used in the negative sense) satisfactory; decent
陸に上がった河童: (おかにあがったかっぱ) - a fish out of water; a kappa up on the land
陸を行く: (りくをいく) - to travel overland; to go by land

陸団子虫: (オカダンゴムシ) - common pill bug (Armadillidium vulgare)
陸地面積: (りくちめんせき) - land area (of a country, continent, etc.)
陸宿借: (オカヤドカリ) - concave land hermit crab (Coenobita cavipes)
陸寄居虫: (オカヤドカリ) - concave land hermit crab (Coenobita cavipes)
陸封型: (りくふうがた) - landlocked variety (of fish)

陸島: (りくとう) - continental island; island formed by separation from a continent
陸援隊: (りくえんたい) - Rikuentai; anti-shogunate army formed in Kyoto in 1867 by Nakaoka Shintaro
陸橋: (りっきょう) - viaduct/overhead bridge/overpass; land bridge

陸生動物: (りくせいどうぶつ) - land animals
陸稲: (りくとう) - rice grown on dry land; dry land rice plant
陸符: (おか) - (丘, 岡, 壟 only) hill/height/knoll/rising ground; (丘, 陸符 only)  {mahj} bonus points awarded to the winner at the end of a game
陸続き: (りくつづき) - border on; by land
